com.menachem.ex3.controller

Class SearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.menachem.ex3.controller.SearchController

  • @Controller
public class SearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is controller of the github search page and result page. its handel the requests and the response of it.
